attributes.action: Allow Blacked Out Front Privacy Glass / Window Tint
attributes.additional_details:
Allow Blacked Out Front Privacy Glass / Window Tint

The law says the front side windows (to either side of the drivers’ head) must allow at least 70% of light to be transmitted through them.

Myself and drives will say even if you have the front side windows limo black you can still see traffic at the side and people walking next to the car.

Privacy Glass / Window Tint is good for many things.

1.Objects left in the front of the car
2. Then children are seated in the front
3.Avoid Overheating
4.Protect Your Skin
5.Accident Protection
6.Safer Driving

This list could go on and on so i say allow the front to be more tinted.
